strIntroduction: What You'll Do Saigon Central Post Office was built by renowned architect Gustave Eiffel. Notre-Dame Cathedral, or Notre-Dame Basilica is a famous old cathedral in Southern Vietnam. Reunification Palace served as the home and office of the South Vietnamese President during the Vietnam War. Ben Thanh Market is a must-see during the day and at sunset. Saigon Central Post Office was built by renowned architect Gustave Eiffel. Notre-Dame Cathedral, or Notre-Dame Basilica is a famous old cathedral in Southern Vietnam. Reunification Palace served as the home and office of the South Vietnamese President during the Vietnam War. Ben Thanh Market is a must-see during the day and at sunset. Saigon Central Post Office was built by renowned architect Gustave Eiffel. Notre-Dame Cathedral, or Notre-Dame Basilica is a famous old cathedral in Southern Vietnam. Reunification Palace served as the home and office of the South Vietnamese President during the Vietnam War. Ben Thanh Market is a must-see during the day and at sunset.
strTitle: Saigon City Tour

strIntroduction: What You'll Do Luxury car to the Cu Chi Tunnels with an expert guide. Explore the war memorial park at Cu Chi, where preserved underground tunnels helped Viet Cong guerrillas during the war. Enjoy on-board refreshments and a mouthwatering Vietnamese lunch at a riverside restaurant. Drive around the countryside to learn about cricket-raising and paper-making at local farms. Pick Up & Return transport by air-conditioned vehicle as well as hotel pick-up and drop off included. Private - limited to 5 people ensures a more personalized experience.
